author: potuz
content: How does this change with PoS? Will we be fine setting that to 1Wei?

author: sky.cactus
content: Good question re PoS.  I guess ultimately the calculation would be that additional block execution complexity means you need to produce a block sooner, and by producing a block sooner you may miss out on additional MEV opportunities and fees from incoming transactions.

author: sky.cactus
content:
The later you produce your block, the more options you have available for what gets included, and thus the more money you can make by including more stuff.
The earlier you produce your block, the more likely it is that it'll reach all other network participants in time.
There is a tension between these two things, and there exists a threshold in fee income below which it isn't worth it to include the transaction and submit the block sooner rather than exclude the transaction and submit it a little later.
